dct_title_s: Carte des écoles chrétiennes de la Macédoine
dct_description_sm: Covers Greek Macedonia and parts of the Macedonian Republic and Bulgaria. Shows distribution of Greek, Bulgarian, Romanian, and Serbian schools as well as of Greek churches and monasteries. Date of publication from: Zartman, I. William. Understanding life in the borderlands, p. 168.
dct_publisher_sm: Paris : Erhard Fres., 35 bis, Rue Denfert-Rochereau, [1905]
